module.title: Work: Funds
module.author: Christian Würker
module.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>funds`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>funds` ( `fundId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `userId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `ISIN` varchar(30) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `currency` varchar(3) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `pieces` float(10,4) NOT NULL, `kag` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `title` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `createdAt` decimal(12,0) unsigned NOT NULL, `modifiedAt` decimal(12,0) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`fundId`), KEY `userId` (`userId`), KEY `ISIN` (`ISIN`), KEY `currency` (`currency`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>fund_prices`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>fund_prices` ( `fundPriceId` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `fundId` int(11) NOT NULL, `pieces` float(10,4) unsigned NOT NULL, `price` float(10,4) NOT NULL, `timestamp` decimal(12,0) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`fundPriceId`), UNIQUE KEY `fundId` (`fundId`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>funds`; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>fund_prices`;
